response.overview: A tribute to the endangered Southern Resident killer whales and the scientist who began the census to protect them. COUNTING ORCA is a cinematic archive of a community fighting to survive against the odds of time and the clock of life itself. This story sheds light on the early research efforts to learn about the southern residents and the hope that Dr. Ken Balcomb created for their future.  Year  2025
response.title: Counting Orca
